description: We used the well-studied interaction between the secondary messenger molecule 3',5'-cyclic diguanosine monophosphate (c-di-GMP) and its receptor EthR to validate the efficiency of spider capturing protein and small molecule interaction and investigated the puoylation sites of EthR by mass spectrometry

modifications.name: No PTMs are included in the dataset

title: Pupylation sites on protein EthR
